title: I Want to Know More!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Ahahahaha! Amazing, you’re soooo good!! You’re totally just like her, Shizuku-chan!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Huff, huff.... Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Gosh, that was the best....! It’s like there are two Nico-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu, I’m glad. I’ve been practicing it for a long time, so!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hey, do you think I could do it too? I want to sound exactly like Nico-chan like how you did, Shizuku-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Would you like to practice with me then, Honoka-san? I’d also like to learn little details that only people close to her would know from you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Little details.... Hmm, let’s see....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I want to know something that only μ’s members would know.... like a secret of hers!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmmmm~.... Nico-chan is.... just Nico-chan! She loves school idols and is herself the best school idol!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu, you’re right. I have to work harder to become the best school idol just like her!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
